description:
Captain Mussel offers to escort Chup and his friends to Sultan Vinegar’s Distillery. Naturally, there is a catch. The Captain requires help in locating “The Eternal Rose,” a pricey painting gone missing from Sir Loin-Stake’s mansion. Will this odd fishing expedition catch an art thief?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Chili Pepper Keibu no Nazotoki Irai
チリペッパー警部の謎解き依頼
